org.epics.graphene

Class IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.graphene.Graph2DRendererUpdate<IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate>
      • org.epics.graphene.IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate

  • public class IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate
extends Graph2DRendererUpdate<IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate>
    A set of parameters that can be applied to a IntensityGraph2DRenderer to update its settings.

    Only the parameters that are set in the update get applied to the renderer. Parameters unique to the intensity graph that can be changed are:

    • zLabel margin size
    • Legend pixel width
    • Legend margin size between the legend and graph
    • Legend margin size between the legend and the image edge
    Author:
    carcassi, sjdallst

      • drawLegend

        public IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate drawLegend(boolean drawLegend)
        Sets this object's drawLegend to the given boolean value. To be used in conjunction with IntensityGraph2DRenderer's update function.
        Parameters:
        drawLegend - boolean that will tell IntensityGraph2DRenderer whether or not it should draw a legend
        Returns:
        this

        public IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate zLabelMargin(int margin)
        Sets this object's zLabelMargin to the given margin size.
        Parameters:
        margin - integer distance(pixels) from the beginning of the z labels to the legend.
        Returns:
        this

      • legendWidth

        public IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate legendWidth(int width)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • graphAreaToLegendMargin

        public IntensityGraph2DRendererUpdate graphAreaToLegendMargin(int margin)
        Sets this object's graphAreaToLegendMargin to the given margin size.
        Parameters:
        margin - distance(pixels) from the end of the legend(including labels and other margins) to the end of the graphics component.
        Returns:
        this

      • getDrawLegend

        public Boolean getDrawLegend()
        Returns:
        Boolean drawLegend, used to determine whether an IntensityGraph2DRenderer object will add a legend to the right of the intensity graph. Can be null.

      • getColorMap

        public NumberColorMap getColorMap()
        Returns:
        ColorScheme colorMap, used to determine which color scheme will be used when drawing an intensity graph. Possible values include: GRAY_SCALE, JET, HOT, COOL, SPRING, BONE, COPPER, PINK

      • getZLabelMargin

        public Integer getZLabelMargin()
        Returns:
        Integer zLabelMargin, distance(pixels) from the beginning of the z labels to the legend.

      • getLegendWidth

        public Integer getLegendWidth()
        Returns:
        Integer legendWidth, corresponds to the x-axis length.

      • getGraphAreaToLegendMargin

        public Integer getGraphAreaToLegendMargin()
        Returns:
        Integer graphAreaToLegendMargin, distance(pixels) from the end of the legend(including labels and other margins) to the end of the graphics component.
